member.summary: Returns name of PCG algorithm for this instance.

member.name: M:Zanaptak.PcgRandom.Pcg8.NextDouble
member.summary: Returns a random double greater than or equal to 0.0 and less than 1.0 (using 53 random bits). Consumes 7 values from the generator.

member.summary: Returns a random 8-bit unsigned integer.

member.name: T:Zanaptak.PcgRandom.Pcg
member.summary: PCG-backed pseudorandom number generator compatible with System.Random.

member.name: T:Zanaptak.PcgRandom.Pcg8Variants.Normal.Default
member.summary: Default: XSH_RR

member.name: T:Zanaptak.PcgRandom.Pcg8Variants.Normal
member.summary: General purpose variant balancing speed and statistical quality. Allows stream selection. Based on LCG generator type.

member.name: T:Zanaptak.PcgRandom.Pcg8Variants.Fast.Default
member.summary: Default: XSH_RR

member.name: T:Zanaptak.PcgRandom.Pcg8Variants.Fast
member.summary: Faster variant but with reduced statistical quality. Based on MCG generator type.

member.name: T:Zanaptak.PcgRandom.Pcg8Variants.Invertible.Default
member.summary: Default: RXS_M_XS

member.name: T:Zanaptak.PcgRandom.Pcg8Variants.Invertible
member.summary: Variant with the same number of outbut bits as internal state bits. Easier to reverse-engineer internal state than other variants.
